column1: henry takashi yamada| henry takashi yamada. born: january 31
column3: 2015. local florists send gifts henry takashi yamada age 93 passed away on may 15
column6: he was beloved husband of emiko kato yamada; father of merilynn & ron (emiko) yamada; grandfather of donji t. yamada-dessert & j. t. yamada; brother of jean tomiko urushima; brother-in-law of akiko kato. he is also survived by many nieces
column7: nephews and other relatives. memorial services will be held on saturday
column9: 11:00 am at centenary united methodist church
